name: Tenebrous Dungeon
detailed_description:
Tenebrous Dungeon is a single-player retro FPS where you alone, must infiltrate the dungeons of Tenebrous Keep to stop a rebel lord from tearing the kingdom apart.

FEATURES

  • XBOX 360 & XBOX ONE Controller Support (Includes Rumble)
  • Over 20 areas - spanning various dungeon, outdoor and castle environments.
  • Fight over 12 different enemy types and bosses with unique fighting styles.
  • Discover secret areas hidden throughout each level to find treasure and weapons.
  • Use ranged, melee and arcane weapons to survive the onslaught of enemies in your way.
  • Choose from 3 difficulty settings to fit your skill level or play style.
  • Arcade-style gameplay reminiscent of shooters from the early 1990's.

SURVIVAL

  • You must find weapons and edible items throughout Tenebrous Keep to survive.
  • Defeat enemies and salvage weapons to increase your score and level up.
  • Use skill-points you earn when you level up to improve your abilities.
  • Consume stimulants like leafs, mushrooms, and potions to gain temporary boosts.

STORY

  • Listen to prisoners, examine items and read notes to unravel the dark and mysterious story behind a rebel lord and an unnatural ally.
  • Learn about the long and tragic history of Tenebrous Keep and the Tenebrous Highlands.
  • Fight your way through different factions and bosses to stop the rebel lord, and prevent a full-scale war from enveloping the kingdom.

short_description: As a war brews over the secession of the Tenebrous Highlands from the Kingdom of Gnarmania, you alone, must infiltrate the dungeons of Tenebrous Keep to stop a rebel lord from tearing the kingdom apart.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 (Service Pack 1)
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU @ 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or graphics card with 512 MB of dedicated VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

legal_notice: Copyright © 2019 Apathus Software, LLC. All rights reserved.

content_descriptors.notes: Tenebrous Dungeon contains mild violence, crude humor, and light profanity.
